events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will review the submitted materials promptly.
The candidate’s application was categorized under Engineering based on keywords such as software developer and coding experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to the candidate to facilitate further communication and scheduling for the software engineering role.
Completed the initial screening call to assess the applicant’s fit for the software engineer position, focusing on technical skills and experience.
The candidate responded positively to the screening outcome and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the engineering team to further evaluate coding and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong software development skills and relevant knowledge.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss company culture fit, benefits, and next steps with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed smoothly, with the candidate showing good alignment with company values and expectations.
An employment offer was proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date to secure acceptance for the software engineer position.
Received positive feedback from the candidate regarding the offer, expressing appreciation and excitement about joining the engineering team.
The candidate formally accepted the job offer for the software engineer role, confirming enthusiasm to start the onboarding process.
The onboarding process commenced with welcome sessions, system access setup, and team introductions for the new software engineer.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, with the new software engineer officially joining and integrated into the engineering department.
